summary:
The long awaited and much asked for mod has finally arrived! Demonic Lydia!
Changes Lydia from a petite woman with a thirst for battle into a hardened Demonic Harbinger of DOOM!
descriptionHtml:
The long awaited and much asked for mod has finally arrived! Demonic Lydia!
Changes Lydia from a petite woman with a thirst for battle into a hardened Demonic Harbinger of DOOM! Also, if you are one of my supporters for my previous mods, please help out by taking 2 minutes to follow this link: http://adf.ly/6BOZw    (it is just to ensure my mods continue, have a heart :D)

In This Mod:
•Lydia is TRANSFORMED into Deamonic Lydia!
•A special weapon made specifically for our Demonic Companion, the DeathKnights Sword!!
•Added Crafting Recipe for DeathKnights Sword and DeathKnights Sword Gem
•Tweaked facial features
•Altered Stats a Bit
•More to come!

Description:
In this mod, Lydia is turned into a Demon, Midnight Black Eyes, Daedric Default, Special Weapon etc. This mod is merely for those who like something a little different from the normal twist of things, personally i am a one person team with not a great deal of experiance in modding so this mod will be updated when i have made it better but until then its just a slightly more powerful evil-looking Lydia with an epic sword. Sword value is not what i set it to, it auto set so dont freak out about how valuable it is. Please Endorse if you like this mod!

Crafting Genres:
•DeathKnights Sword - Daedric
•DeathKnights Soulgem - Misc

Bugs:
None yet go find some!

Credits:
Bethesda Softworks Creation Kit
solar481
author: solar481
